name: SpotilifeC
subtitle: Spotify Premium Free
description: This is my repo for compiled Spotilife IPAs. Spotilife is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

apps.name: SpotilifeC
apps.subtitle: Spotify Premium Free.
apps.localizedDescription: This is my repo for compiled Spotilife IPAs. Spotilife is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App saves photos to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses camera to take photos.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: App uses microphone to record video.

news.title: SpotilifeC
news.caption: An update is available for My Example App.
